oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Saturday Night At Tom Benton's - Tom Benton - 1942
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of five of the six tunes from the album Saturday Night At Tom Benton's, featuring Tom Benton (performer), T. P. Benton (performer), Edward Robinson (performer), the Frank Luther Singers (performers), the American Chamber Music Group (performers), and Harry Sosnik (conductor), released on Decca records in 1942.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tom Benton; T. P. Benton; Edward Robinson; Frank Luther Singers; Harry Sosnik; American Chamber Music Group
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Chillmark Suite Part 1 (Tom Benton harmonica, T. P. Benton flute, Edward Robinson harpsichord) -- Chillmark Suite Part 2 (Tom Benton harmonica, T. P. Benton flute, Edward Robinson harpsichord) -- Gay Head Dance (Tom Benton harmonica, T. P. Benton flute, Edward Robinson harpsichord) -- Old Joe Clark (Tom Benton harmonica, T. P. Benton flute, Frank Luther Singers, Harry Sosnik, American Chamber Music Group) -- Wayfaring Stranger (Tom Benton harmonica, T. P. Benton flute, Frank Luther Singers, Harry Sosnik, American Chamber Music Group)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Benton, Thomas Hart, 1889-1975; Robinson, Edward; American Chamber Music Group; Luther, Frank, 1905-1980; Frank Luther Singers; Sosnik, Harry, 1906-1996;
